name: Farm Quest (itch) (Morris)
description:
Moooooo! You are enjoying a nice life with your cow when suddenly you get forced to explore an abandoned building. Will you quickly speedrun this exploration or will you uncover some hidden secrets?

(Minor errors would be updated and fixed)
